about.appDesc: A tool to config SteveTaikoCon Controller and test any type of Tatacon.
about.freewareTip: This tool is an open-sourced freeware.

disabledTips.webHidUnsupported: Configuration page is disabled as your browser doesn't support WebHID API.
disabledTips.controllerNotConnected: Please connect your SteveTaikoCon / Tatacon by clicking button on the top-left.

sideKeyBinding.label: Key Binding of {side}
sideKeyBinding.description: The key that your controller will emulate to press when this side / button on controller is hit / pressed.

keyInvokeDuration.label: Key invoke duration
keyInvokeDuration.description: Define how long will the key be pressed. In milliseconds. Set to 0 for instant release.<1></1>If invoke time is too long, it may cause lagging. Or if invoke time is too short, the game maybe unable to detect the input.<3></3>If you can't determine how to adjust this value or you are playing official game, set to 16 ms for most of the game and cases.<5></5>If you are using emulators or any game that is <7>based on input events</7>, you can set to 0 for best experienses and lowest latency.

sensorMultiplier.label: Sensor value multiplier of {sensorSide}
sensorMultiplier.description: Will multiply the sensor value of this side by the number, default is 100%.

triggerThreshold.label: Trigger threshold
triggerThreshold.description: 任意传感器数值超过这个数字则进入判定阶段，单位可以当作电压值（mV）理解。<1></1>过低的值容易导致串音，过高的值会需要用更大的力气敲击，甚至可能导致吃音。<3></3>可以在调节设置后在测试页面中确认敲击效果。

ledHitIndicator.label: 启用 LED 敲击指示灯
ledHitIndicator.description: 在判定的时候可以通过亮起 LED 灯指示当前敲击的结果，红色代表鼓面，蓝色代表鼓边。<1></1>可以借助此功能来确认与电脑之间的延迟情况（此指示灯可以被认为是零延迟的）

doubleSideHitDetection.label: 启用双押判定（实验性）
doubleSideHitDetection.description: 在鼓面两侧或鼓边两侧同时敲击时，是否判定为双押，并同时按下两个按键。

taikoControllerSelector.title: 检测到的太鼓控制器
taikoControllerSelector.noControllerTip: 未检测到太鼓控制器<1></1>请检查你的电脑是否正确连接到了太鼓控制器<3></3>且太鼓控制器已切换到键盘模式

webHidCheck.title: 你的浏览器不支持 WebHID API
webHidCheck.desc: 本网页需要支持 WebHID API 的浏览器才能正常工作。请使用最新版的 Chrome/Chromuim 或 Microsoft Edge 浏览器。
webHidCheck.refer: 详情请参考：<1><0><0>WebHID API 兼容性清单</0></0></1>
